tool_description: Validates and normalizes tracking numbers from various carriers, ensuring proper format and carrier identification.

tracking_number.description: The raw tracking number to validate

carrier_hint.description: Optional carrier name hint to improve validation accuracy

error_messages: Invalid tracking number format: Ensure the tracking number contains only alphanumeric characters and allowed special characters.
Unrecognized carrier: The tracking number format doesn't match any supported carrier patterns.
Tracking number too short: Minimum length is 6 characters.
Tracking number too long: Maximum length is 35 characters.
usage: Provide a tracking_number string and optionally specify a carrier_hint to improve validation accuracy. The tool will return the validated tracking number with identified carrier information.

is_valid.description: Whether the tracking number is valid

normalized_tracking_number.description: The cleaned and normalized tracking number

carrier_service_type.description: The identified service type (e.g., Ground, Express, Priority)
